title: (x) Embroidery fonts - Berthold City, ITC Zapf Chancery, Kaufmann {Jan E, Yves}
content:
Hi firned help me to ID these fonts used on this design

Thanks

Miguel

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [embroidery.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031424/http:/typophile.com/files/embroidery.jpg) | 179.89 KB |

author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
Pumping & Ready Mix looks like Berthold City.

DIAZ could be a stretched Zapf Chancery Italic.

I just love seeing my last name all stretched out in an unimaginative script...

Mike Diaz :-)

Hi friend thank you

what about the NEXTEL and the numerals

thanks in advance

Miguel
NEXTEL and the numerals look like Kaufmann Bold.
Oh no. Yves pops in. Darn.
It happens _so_ often that a thread is dormant for a little while, and then suddenly two people reply at about the same moment. The mysteries and wonders of Typophile... :^)
